long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Glitch has the awesome superpowers of remixing any (public) app and importing code from Git repositories. This chrome extension makes it a bit easier to remix glitch apps, import code from git, or start fresh.

âž¤ Remix glitch apps
âž¤ Generate embed code
âž¤ Import code from GitHub and GitLab
âž¤ Start new projects from any page on the web
